member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ConverterUtility
member.summary: Provides some utilies methods for translating Http attributes to OpenXml elements.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ConverterUtility.FormatParagraphAlign(System.String)
member.summary: Convert the Html text align attribute (horizontal alignement) to its corresponding OpenXml value.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ConverterUtility.FormatVAlign(System.String)
member.summary: Convert the Html vertical-align attribute to its corresponding OpenXml value.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ConverterUtility.ConvertToFontSize(System.String)
member.summary: Convert Html regular font-size to OpenXml font value (expressed in point).

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ConverterUtility.ConvertToHighlightColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Convert an Html color to its hightlight color representation in OpenXml.
member.remarks: As OpenXml supports a limited number of highlight colors, we will check whether the Html color is near a known color. If no near color are satisfied, it will returns HighlightColorValues.None.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ConverterUtility.AreColorClose(System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32)
member.summary: Check whether two colors are close (as a Magic Wand tool performs).
member.remarks: This algorithm comes from the source code of Paint.Net, in FloodToolBase.cs, CheckColor method.
member.param: From 0 to 100.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ConverterUtility.DownloadData(System.Uri,NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.WebProxy)
member.summary: Download some data located at the specified url.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ConverterUtility.GetImagePartTypeForImageUrl(System.Uri)
member.summary: Gets the OpenXml ImagePartType associated to an image.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ConverterUtility.GetImageSize(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads an image from a stream and grab its size.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ConverterUtility.ToHexString(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Convert a .Net Color to a hex string.

member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlEnumerator
member.summary: Split an html piece of text and provide a way to enumerate its tags.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlEnumerator.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlEnumerator.MoveUntilMatch(System.String)
member.summary: Use as MoveNext() but this function will stop once the current value is equals to tag.
member.param: The tag to stop on (Optional).
member.returns:
If tag is null, it returns true if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; false if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.
If tag is not null, it returns false as long as the tag was not found.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlEnumerator.StyleAttributes
member.summary: Gets an attribute in the Style attribute of a Html tag.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlEnumerator.Attributes
member.summary: Gets an attribute from a Html tag.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlEnumerator.IsCurrentHtmlTag
member.summary: Gets whether the current element is an Html tag or not.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlEnumerator.IsSelfClosedTag
member.summary: Gets whether the current element is an Html tag that is closed (example: <td/>).

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlEnumerator.CurrentTag
member.summary: If property is a Html tag, it returns the name of that tag.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlEnumerator.Current
member.summary: Gets the line or tag at the current position of the enumerator.

member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter
member.summary: Helper class to convert some Html text to OpenXml elements.

member.name: F:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.paragraphs
member.summary: The list of paragraphs that will be returned.

member.name: F:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.elements
member.summary: Holds the elements to append to the current paragraph.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.#ctor(DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.MainDocumentPart)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: The mainDocumentPart of a document where to write the conversion to.
member.remarks: We preload some configuration from inside the document such as style, bookmarks,...

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Start the parse processing.
member.returns: Returns a list of parsed paragraph.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.RemoveEmptyParagraphs
member.summary: Remove empty paragraph unless 2 tables are side by side. These paragraph could be empty due to misformed html or spaces in the html source.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.AlternateProcessHtmlChunks(NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlEnumerator,System.String)
member.summary: Save the actual list and restart with a new one. Continue to process until we found endTag.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.AddParagraph(DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlCompositeElement)
member.summary: Add a new paragraph, table, ... to the list of processed paragrahs. This method takes care of adding the new element to the current table if it exists.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.AddFootnoteReference(System.String)
member.summary: Add a note to the FootNotes part and ensure it exists.
member.param: The description of an acronym, abbreviation, some book references, ...
member.returns: Returns the id of the footnote reference.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.AddEndnoteReference(System.String)
member.summary: Add a note to the Endnotes part and ensure it exists.
member.param: The description of an acronym, abbreviation, some book references, ...
member.returns: Returns the id of the endnote reference.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.AddFigureCaption
member.summary: Add a new figure caption to the document.
member.returns: Returns the id of the new figure caption.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.CompleteCurrentParagraph
member.summary: Push the elements members to the current paragraph and reset the elements collection.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.RefreshStyles
member.summary: Refresh the cache of styles presents in the document.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.EnsureCaptionStlye
member.summary: Ensure the 'caption' style exists in the document.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.ProcessContainerAttributes(NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlEnumerator,System.Collections.Generic.IList{DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlElement})
member.summary:
There is a few attributes shared by a large number of tags. This method will check them for a limited number of tags (

, 

, 
,  and ).

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.RaiseProvisionImage(NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ProvisionImageEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the ProvisionImage event.

member.name: E:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.ProvisionImage
member.summary: Occurs when an image tag was detected and you want to manage yourself the download of the data.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.AcronymPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets where to render the acronym or abbreviation tag.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.ConsiderDivAsParagraph
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether the
tag should be processed as

. It depends whether you consider

as part of the layout or as part of a text field.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.ExcludeLinkAnchor
member.summary: Gets or sets whether anchor links are included or not in the conversion.
member.remarks:
An anchor is a term used to define a hyperlink destination inside a document. .
It exists some predefined anchors used by Word such as _top to refer to the top of the document. The anchor #_top is always accepted regardless this property value. For others anchors like refering to your own bookmark or a title, add a and elements and set the value of href to #<name of your bookmark>.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.HtmlStyles
member.summary: Gets the Html styles manager mapping to OpenXml style properties.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.ImageProcessing
member.summary: Gets or sets how the tag should be handled.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.BaseImageUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the base Uri used to automaticaly resolve relative images if used with ImageProcessing = AutomaticDownload.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.WebProxy
member.summary: Gets or sets the proxy used to download images.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.TableCaptionPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets where the Legend tag (<caption>) should be rendered (above or below the table).

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlConverter.RenderPreAsTable
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the <pre> tag should be rendered as a table.
member.remarks: The table will contains only one cell.

member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.AcronymPosition
member.summary: Specifies the position of an acronym or abbreviation in the resulting conversion.

member.name: F:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.AcronymPosition.PageEnd
member.summary: Position at the end of the page.

member.name: F:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.AcronymPosition.DocumentEnd
member.summary: Position at the end of the document.

member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ImageProcessing
member.summary: Specifies how the tag will be handled during the conversion.

member.name: F:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ImageProcessing.Ignore
member.summary: Image tag are not processed.

member.name: F:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ImageProcessing.AutomaticDownload
member.summary: The image will be downloaded using a classic . The src attribute should point on an absolute uri.

member.name: F:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ImageProcessing.ManualProvisioning
member.summary: The image data will be provided by calling the event.

member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ProvisionImageEventArgs
member.summary: The event arguments used for a ProvisionImage event.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ProvisionImageEventArgs.ImageUrl
member.summary: Gets the value of the href tag.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ProvisionImageEventArgs.Data
member.summary: Gets the styles definition part located inside MainDocumentPart.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ProvisionImageEventArgs.ImageExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the image.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.ProvisionImageEventArgs.ImageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the width and height (in pixels) of the image as it should be displayed in the document.

member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlAttributeCollection
member.summary: Represents the collection of attributes present in the current html tag.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlAttributeCollection.GetAsInt(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an attribute representing an integer.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlAttributeCollection.GetAsColor(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an attribute representing a color (named color, hexadecimal or hexadecimal without the preceding # character).

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlAttributeCollection.GetAsUnit(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an attribute representing an unit: 120px, 10pt, 5em, 20%, ...
member.returns: If the attribute is misformed, the property is set to false.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlAttributeCollection.GetAsMargin(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an attribute representing the 4 unit sides.
member.returns: If the attribute is misformed, the property is set to false.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlAttributeCollection.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of attributes for this tag.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.HtmlAttributeCollection.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the named attribute.

member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.TableContext
member.summary: Holds the tables in the order we discover them (to support nested tables).

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.TableContext.CellPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the current processed cell in a table. Origins is at the top left corner.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.TableContext.RowSpan
member.summary: Gets the concurrent remaining row span foreach columns.

member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.Margin
member.summary: Represents a Html Unit (ie: 120px, 10em, ...).

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.Margin.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parse the margin style attribute.
member.remarks:
The margin property can have from one to four values. margin:25px 50px 75px 100px; top margin is 25px right margin is 50px bottom margin is 75px left margin is 100px
margin:25px 50px 75px; top margin is 25px right and left margins are 50px bottom margin is 75px
margin:25px 50px; top and bottom margins are 25px right and left margins are 50px
margin:25px; all four margins are 25px

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.Margin.Bottom
member.summary: Gets the unit of the bottom side.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.Margin.Left
member.summary: Gets the unit of the left side.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.Margin.Top
member.summary: Gets the unit of the top side.

member.name: P:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.Margin.Right
member.summary: Gets the unit of the right side.

member.name: T:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.OpenXmlStyleCollection
member.summary: Defines the styles to apply on OpenXml elements.

member.name: F:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.OpenXmlStyleCollection.tags
member.summary: Holds the tags to apply to the current OpenXml element.
member.remarks: The key contains the name of the tag, the values contains a list of queued attributes of the same tag.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.OpenXmlStyleCollection.ApplyTags(DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlCompositeElement)
member.summary: Apply all the current Html tag (Run properties) to the specified run.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.OpenXmlStyleCollection.BeginTag(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlElement})
member.summary: Add the specified tag to the list.
member.param: The name of the tag.
The Run properties to apply to the next build run until the tag is popped out.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.OpenXmlStyleCollection.BeginTag(System.String,DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlElement[])
member.summary: Add the specified tag to the list.
member.param: The name of the tag.
The Run properties to apply to the next build run until the tag is popped out.

member.summary: Merge the properties with the tag of the previous level.
member.param: The name of the tag.
The properties to apply to the next build run until the tag is popped out.

member.summary: Merge the properties with the tag of the previous level.
member.param: The name of the tag.
The properties to apply to the next build run until the tag is popped out.

member.name: M:NotesFor.HtmlToOpenXml.OpenXmlStyleCollection.EndTag(System.String)
member.summary: Remove the specified tag from the list.
member.param: The name of the tag.

member.summary: Move inside the current tag related to table (td, thead, tr, ...) and converts some common attributes to their OpenXml equivalence.
